content: --याम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} not old or weakened, not stale, fresh, not worn out by use; °मं च यौवनं <ls>Dk. 123</ls> fresh, blooming; °मं वयः <ls n="Dk.">158</ls>; छंदांस्ययातयामानि <ls>Bhāg.</ls> (where Śrīdhara says अ° = विगतदोषाणि free from faults, faultless, pure. (--मं) <ab>N.</ab> of certain texts of the Yajurveda revealed to Yājñavalkya. °यामता freshness, unimpaired nature, strength, or vigour, purity.)
